| HistoryText             = The Trojan Guard is a joint of numerous [[Iron Man Armor|Iron Man Armors]] controlled by a collective A.I., and led by [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony]] and [[Arno Stark (Earth-616)|Arno Stark]], with the purpose to defend [[Troy (Mandarin City)|Troy]] from any menace.{{r|Iron Man Vol 5 20}}

| Equipment               = [[Iron Man Armor|Iron Man Armors]]

| Notes                   = * The Trojan Guard uses an A.I. in its version 1.3, but due to its instability, it operates with its v1.29.{{r|Iron Man Vol 5 20}}
| Trivia                  = * Many of the suits part of the Trojan Guard resemble [[Iron Man Armor (Earth-199999)|Iron Man armors]] from the [[Earth-199999|Marvel Cinematic Universe]], including [[Iron Man Armor MK XXXVIII (Earth-199999)|MK XXXVIII]], [[Iron Man Armor MK XXXIX (Earth-199999)|MK XXXIX]], [[Iron Man Armor MK XLII (Earth-199999)|MK XLII]], [[Iron Man Armor MK XXXVI (Earth-199999)|MK XXXVI]], [[Iron Man Armor MK XXXII (Earth-199999)|MK XXXII]].
